an5.158:1.1: “Mendicants, a mendicant with five qualities is overcome by timidity.
an5.158:1.3: It’s when a mendicant is faithless, unethical, with little learning, lazy, and witless.
an5.158:1.4: A mendicant with these five qualities is overcome by timidity.
an5.158:2.1: A mendicant with five qualities is self-assured.
an5.158:2.3: It’s when a mendicant is faithful, ethical, learned, energetic, and wise.
an5.158:2.4: A mendicant with these five qualities is self-assured.”
